short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows inspirational and thoughtful quotes as you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
thoughtfully: your daily source of motivation

Transform each new tab with quotes that resonate with your mood and mindset. thoughtfully offers a diverse array of quotes ranging from motivation and love to philosophy, faith, and poetry—ensuring there’s something for everyone. Whether you’re looking for a boost of motivation, a touch of romance, or some philosophical reflection, thoughtfully is designed to be just as varied as the individuals who use it.

Features:

    Quotes tailored to different moods and themes.
    Clean, calming design to help keep you centered.
    Shareable quotes for spreading positivity.
    Works completely offline for uninterrupted inspiration.
    Privacy-first: No user data is collected, ever.

Bring thoughtfulness to your browsing experience—one quote at a time.
